title: Green Sage Cafe - Westgate
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffeehouse cafe with a few locations in town. Breakfast all day includes tofu scramble as a substitute for egg. Organic coffee drinks with non-dairy milk option, smoothies, and beverages. Menu marks which items can be made vegan. Uses some organic ingredients. Order at the counter.
